title: HELP! Convert CMYK to RGB
content:
Hi Everyone,  
If anyone can help me it would be greatly appreciated!!!!!  
I have been given a “style guide” for anything that we put out, however, I do not have photoshop or any other program(s) that I am used to having. I need to convert two colours to RGB: 1) c - 100%, m - 65%, y - 0%, k - 30% and 2) c - 100%, m - 10%, y - 0%, k - 10%. If anyone knows how to get a colour even close that would be great!  
Thanx heaps and fingers crossed someone knows how to do this!  
AliG.  
:)
author: AliG

comments.content:
I used Photoshop CS2 and got the following:

(c-100, m-65, y-0, k-30)  
R: 28  
G: 72  
B: 130

(c-100, m-10, y-0, k-10)  
R: 0  
G: 145  
B: 205

Hi. I used Photoshop’s color palette for the conversions...

For c:100-m:65-y:0-k:30, I get r:0-g:70-b:133.

For c:100-m:10-y:0-k:10, I get r:0-g:147-b:208.

Hi everyone, thankyou so much for your help! It is really appreciated!  
You guys are legends!  
Now I just need to get approval for photoshop & illustrator!!!!! Bahahahahah :)

Thanx again everyone, have a fabulous weekend!  
AliG  
:)
